title: GET_PED_PALETTE_VARIATION
content:
0xE3DD5F2A84B422810xEF1BC082// GetPedPaletteVariation
int GET_PED_PALETTE_VARIATION(Ped ped, int componentId);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.componentId: The component id to get the palette variation from. Refer to SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION.
codeBlocks:
// GetPedPaletteVariation
int GET_PED_PALETTE_VARIATION(Ped ped, int componentId);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_PED_PALETTE_VARIATION
GetPedPaletteVariation(ped, 0)
